channel.title: Pak Utility Mod Question
channel.description:
I apologize if this has been asked somewhere else, but I cannot seem to find an answer. Can anyone tell me if it is possible to change the keybind for flying down in Pak Utility Mod? For instance, use the same key as crouch to go down?
I am using Pak Utility Mod for flight and also using the Smart Mod for extending foundations, and unfortunately, they both use the Alt key (trying to extend foundations while flying is nearly impossible because Alt makes you fly down).
Thanks in advance for any help!

item.title: Pak Utility Mod Question
item.dc:creator: @UgloBuglo Uglo Buglo
item.description:
@UgloBuglo wrote:

A late answer, but you can also use the arrow keys to build with Smart Mod - no need to use ALT key.

Read full topic

item.title: Pak Utility Mod Question
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

sadly no. unless it has a config file no
